description: Customer received an email impersonating Apple Support asking for login credentials.
analyst_notes: Similar email pattern detected last month. Subject line: 'Verify your Apple ID now'.

description: Multiple gift card purchases attempted using compromised credit cards.
analyst_notes: IP address matched a previously flagged carding operation from overseas.

description: Caller impersonated AppleCare agent to gain access to device reset credentials.
analyst_notes: Victim was manipulated into giving device serial number and passcode.

description: Unusual login via VPN followed by changes to account email and password.
analyst_notes: Previous login IP from US; takeover IP from Eastern Europe. Pattern matches known ATO tactics.

description: Customer mistyped password and was locked out, flagged as potential fraud.
analyst_notes: No compromise found. Login attempt from usual device and IP.
